seo.title: New Build Golf Properties for Sale in Spain
seo.description: Explore exclusive new build golf properties in Costa Blanca. From frontline villas to luxury apartments near top courses. Find your dream golf home in the sun today.

hero.description: A modern 3‑bedroom villa a short drive from several 18‑hole golf courses, the Mediterranean and all everyday services in a big shopping center nearby.
hero.footer_note: Lock-up-and-leave homes made for golf trips, winter stays & family holidays.

villas.title: Villas made for golf days
villas.description_1: You get a three‑bedroom, two‑bathroom villa of about 106 m² built, with smart use of space and light. The open‑plan living and kitchen area connects directly to the terrace and garden, so coming home after a round feels easy and relaxed.
villas.description_2: One bedroom and one bathroom are on the ground floor; two bedrooms and another bathroom are upstairs with access to a large terrace. There is room for friends or family to join you, without losing privacy or comfort.

points.space: Approx. 106 m² built, about 85 m² indoors, 56 m² of terraces.
points.garden: Private garden of roughly 150–213 m² with on‑plot space for parking and outdoor living.

golf.title: Your base in the Orihuela Costa golf belt
golf.description_1: From Costa Blanca you are only a short drive from several well‑known 18‑hole courses in the Orihuela Costa area. You can vary where you play, adjust difficulty to the group and keep golf fresh week after week.
golf.description_2: The climate gives you many sunny days and mild winters, so the villa works for long winter stays, spring and autumn trips – not just a two‑week summer holiday.

points.cluster: Cluster of golf courses nearby instead of a single option.
points.season: Long playing season with comfortable winter temperatures.
points.routine: Easy to build a routine: golf in the morning, sea or terrace time in the afternoon.

location.title: La Zenia: easy living by the sea
location.description: Costa Blanca sits in a residential part of La Zenia with supermarkets, cafés, restaurants and services close by. A large shopping centre in the area adds more shops, dining and entertainment in one place.

services.title: Services & Leisure
services.description: Everyday services and leisure within a short distance.

beaches.title: Beaches
beaches.description: Sandy beaches and coastal walks nearby.

year_round.title: Year-round
year_round.description: Suitable for both short breaks and longer winter stays.

location.note: Beaches and small coves are only a short drive away, ideal for rest days or for family members who prefer the sea to the fairways. You do not need to choose between golf, beach and convenience – you get all three.

lifestyle.title: Modern, low‑maintenance comfort
lifestyle.description_1: These are new build villas with a clean, contemporary design. Fitted wardrobes, a modern kitchen and well‑planned bathrooms keep the house practical and uncluttered.
lifestyle.description_2: Private plots are big enough for terraces, planting and, depending on configuration, a pool area – but not so large that they become a burden to maintain. Installations are prepared for year‑round use, not just high summer.

points.construction: New construction with modern materials and equipment.
points.outdoor: Outdoor space focused on living, dining and relaxing.
points.maintenance: A home that is easy to close, leave and open again several times a year.
